description: Represent lists of objects as cards. This is intended to be a more responsive replacement for tables. This component will display a list of items as cards with a count (x of y) and a Show more button to load more results. There is also a slot for adding filtering or other content above the list. A slot is provided with card model & index parameters for customising how to display the model for each card.

props.name: model
props.description:
Model for a card in the list. This is passed through to the #card slot allowing the parent component to provide
the card layout.

props.name: total
props.description: For pagination - the total count of records including those not displayed.

props.name: color
props.description: Specify a hover color for the cards.

props.name: clickable
props.description:
Specify cards are clickable. This will return click events when cards are clicked on. NOTE: use the href in the
card model instead of clickable=true if cards are links.

props.name: ofLabel
props.description: override the default 'x of y' text.

events.name: show-more
events.description: Emitted when the 'Show more' button is clicked.

events.name: click
events.description: Emitted when a cards are clickable & a card is clicked & not disabled.

slots.name: filters
slots.description: slot for providing filters for the card list aligned next to the result count

slots.name: card
slots.description: slot for rendering card contents, two parameters are available: cardModel (the model item to be rendered) & index
